segments.text: I can see the puddle growing under the sink; it’s so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her indifference is maddening, especially with the water running so freely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, what are they thinking climbing that stool like it’s a jungle gym?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re going behind her back like this; it’s just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I thought children were supposed to listen to adults; this feels like pure rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy knows how to catch himself if he falls; it’s a tightrope act for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR
